title: Chang Hao (Go player)
text:
Chang Hao (; born November 7, 1976 in <a href="Shanghai">Shanghai</a>) is a professional <a href="Go%20%28board%20game%29">Go</a> <a href="Go%20players">player</a>. He is a 9 dan <a href="Go%20%28board%20game%29">Go</a> player from China. He is China's best player of the 1990s and one of the best in the world. Growing up he was a <a href="Child%20prodigy">prodigy</a> in China, he has won many titles, including three international champions. He is the best friend of <a href="Lee%20Chang-ho">Lee Chang-ho</a>, whom he most recently defeated in the final of the 7th <a href="Chunlan%20Cup">Chunlan Cup</a>. Some of his hobbies include playing <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>, swimming, and traveling. He is married to <a href="Zhang%20Xuan%20%28Go%29">Zhang Xuan</a>, who is also a Go player.
Titles and runners-up.
Ranks #3 in the <a href="List%20of%20top%20title%20holders%20in%20Go">total number of titles in China</a>.
